!Rafforty: Our Zinnia Guild's goal is to restore Queen Freya to her original self. First, we must eliminate the Ice Fairy Sirra, who is a major obstacle between us and our Queen. If you want to join us, speak with *Steward* at the *Ice Queen's Castle*. And don't forget to bring your friends with you! When you go, take *10 Silver Hemocytes* to him.
